query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS campaign_posts (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_id INT NOT NULL, post_id INT NOT NULL, added_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comments (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT NOT NULL, instagram_comment_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, text TEXT NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, parent_comment_id INT, sentiment ENUM('positive', 'neutral', 'negative', 'toxic'), sentiment_score VARCHAR(10), sentiment_confidence VARCHAR(10), category ENUM('question', 'praise', 'complaint', 'spam', 'request', 'general'), ai_summary TEXT, suggested_response TEXT, has_responded BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, responded_at TIMESTAMP, response_text TEXT, requires_attention BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, is_hidden BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, analyzed_at TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visual_analysis (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE, description TEXT NOT NULL, composition TEXT, color_palette JSON, emotions JSON, subjects JSON, style VARCHAR(100), visual_quality_score VARCHAR(10), emotional_impact_score VARCHAR(10), clarity_score VARCHAR(10), brand_alignment_score VARCHAR(10), predicted_engagement VARCHAR(50), actual_engagement VARCHAR(50), strengths JSON, improvements JSON, similar_post_ids JSON, analyzed_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4FiUfikgDQU4MHP.4fff9066d80d --database U34NkkLJbrpbDaDFLXHvpq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS campaign_posts (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_id INT NOT NULL, post_id INT NOT NULL, added_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comments (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT NOT NULL, instagram_comment_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, text TEXT NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, parent_comment_id INT, sentiment ENUM('positive', 'neutral', 'negative', 'toxic'), sentiment_score VARCHAR(10), sentiment_confidence VARCHAR(10), category ENUM('question', 'praise', 'complaint', 'spam', 'request', 'general'), ai_summary TEXT, suggested_response TEXT, has_responded BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, responded_at TIMESTAMP, response_text TEXT, requires_attention BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, is_hidden BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, analyzed_at TIMESTAMP); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visual_analysis (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE, description TEXT NOT NULL, composition TEXT, color_palette JSON, emotions JSON, subjects JSON, style VARCHAR(100), visual_quality_score VARCHAR(10), emotional_impact_score VARCHAR(10), clarity_score VARCHAR(10), brand_alignment_score VARCHAR(10), predicted_engagement VARCHAR(50), actual_engagement VARCHAR(50), strengths JSON, improvements JSON, similar_post_ids JSON, analyzed_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
